lead_paragraph: David Beckham and the Los Angeles Galaxy practiced in front of more than 15,000 fans at Westpac Stadium in Wellington, New Zealand, today. The 35,000-seat stadium is the site for tomorrow’s exhibition match between the Galaxy and Wellington Phoenix. It is also the Wellington home of the All Blacks rugby team. The All Blacks might draw a few thousand to a training session before a major match. To draw 15,000 to a soccer practice, in a country in which soccer is a minor sport, was unprecedented.
